name: Suikoden I&II HD Remaster Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars
name_original: Suikoden I&II HD Remaster Gate Rune and Dunan Unification Wars
description:
A hero's destiny is written in the stars
Konami's legendary JRPGs, Suikoden I and Suikoden II, now remastered in HD!

The story of Suikoden I
A former hero turned violent tyrant and an empire in decline.
A liberation army rises up in an act of rebellion against an oppressive law.
One by one, the 108 stars of Fate come together to shape the course of history.

The story of Suikoden II
The hero of our story and his friend Jowy are members of the Unicorn Brigade, which was involved in a long-standing border dispute between the Kingdom of Highland and the City-State of Jowstown.

Months ago a cordial agreement was signed between the two forces, happy to end the feud.
But beneath the fleeting peace, a new war is brewing...

Features of Suikoden I and Suikoden II HD
The background illustrations are now in HD.
・New effects give a new look to the pixel art animation.
・New ambient sound effects to immerse you in this fantasy world.
Battle sound is now also in HD and adds a new level of realism.
・New autosave system
・Battle fast forwarding
・Conversation logging
